__e: Those five thousand ships you say the Allies haven't got well, they've got them!
Our allies won't make it in time. There is nothing that can be done.
You and me is working together, ain't no mountain high enough.
No, no... in defiance of the Communists, the allies of anyone who thinks Germany is finished.
General, the humans may yet become valuable allies.
I only need to stop your allies rallying to you.
We need allies to do what you're thinking about.
And you kept us as allies when they came gunning'.
Yes, but you're gonna need allies, and I've got them.
I have made allies and enemies in scores. But the closest thing that I have come to a friend... Is you.
I need allies, and he and I want the same thing.

And in a war, you need allies.
Which means we have no partner in this fight.
Lord knows we have been comrades in many a fight.
And then we teamed up with the Others because worse people were coming.
Align with me and the two of us can step outside of this mess together.
